metadata.title: CVE-2021-31812 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Apache PDFBox, a carefully crafted PDF file can trigger an infinite loopwhile loading the file. This issue affects Apache PDFBox version 2.0.23 andprior 2.0.x versions.

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
